title: This KDP Software Has Got Me Excited!

tactics.name: category_ranking_analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket's Historic Category Feature to identify optimal KDP categories by analyzing sales thresholds, publisher competition, and book age data
steps: Input niche keywords into Publisher Rocket's category search
Evaluate large publisher percentage (lower is better for indie authors)
Check BSR thresholds for top 10 and #1 rankings
Analyze average book age in the category

tactics.name: sub_niche_keyword_research
tactics.description: Identify sub niches and keywords within a broad niche using Amazon search terms and tools.
steps: Use plugins like AMZ Suggestion Expander
source_quotes: I look for sub niches within this overall broad niche of fashion coloring books

heuristics.name: low_review_niche_boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews in a category are below 200, prioritize this niche
source_quotes: 'the average age was lower than the previous one'
heuristics.description: 'if median reviews in a category are below 200, prioritize this niche.'

heuristics.name: competitive_score_threshold
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is low, prioritize keywords
source_quotes: Lower the number [of competitive score], the better

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket's Historic Category Feature provides indie authors with insights into category competition and sales potential
source_quotes: 'this has become my new KDP niche research tool'
claims.description: 'Publisher Rocket's Historic Category Feature provides indie authors with insights into category competition and sales potential.'

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket provides estimated monthly searches and competitive scores for Amazon keywords.
source_quotes: Publisher Rocket helps us even more by giving us this competitive score

niche_patterns.example: fashion coloring books + low competition + seasonal demand
niche_patterns.description: Identify niches with low publisher saturation, manageable sales thresholds, and predictable seasonal trends
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances market opportunity with achievable ranking potential
source_quotes: 'we can see there's more sales in December'

niche_patterns.description: Target specific sub niches with optimized keywords to improve discoverability.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Leverages high-traffic keywords while minimizing competition
source_quotes: I'd put all these down in a spreadsheet
